name: PDF Header Plugin
description: Add headers to PDFs using Glide plugin.
author: Dharmil Shah

parameters.name: pdf_url
parameters.description: URL of the PDF to modify

parameters.name: header_text
parameters.description: Header text to add to the PDF

parameters.name: font_size
parameters.description: Font size of the header text

parameters.name: font_color
parameters.description: Color of the header text (hex code)

parameters.name: header_position
parameters.description: Position of the header (top or bottom)

result.name: pdf_with_header_url
result.description: Data URL of the modified PDF with header
